```{r setup}
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
#| message: false
#| error: false
#| results: 'hide'

# Load dashboardr (includes dplyr, highcharter as dependencies)
library(dashboardr)

# Global chunk options
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  echo = FALSE,
  warning = FALSE,
  message = FALSE,
  error = FALSE,
  fig.width = 12,
  fig.height = 8,
  dpi = 300
)

# Load data
data <- readRDS('dataset_small_35obs_2.rds')

# Data summary
cat('Dataset loaded:', nrow(data), 'rows,', ncol(data), 'columns\n')

```

### Country Filter


Select countries using dropdown.


---


```{r}
#| echo: false
#| results: 'asis'
dashboardr::render_input(
  input_id = "country_select",
  label = "Select Countries:",
  type = "select_multiple",
  filter_var = "country",
  options = c("Netherlands", "Germany", "France", "United Kingdom", "Italy"),
  options_from = NULL,
  default_selected = c("Netherlands", "Germany", "France"),
  placeholder = "Select...",
  width = "300px",
  min = 0,
  max = 100,
  step = 1,
  value = NULL,
  show_value = TRUE,
  inline = TRUE,
  stacked = FALSE,
  stacked_align = "center",
  group_align = "left",
  ncol = NULL,
  nrow = NULL,
  toggle_series = NULL,
  override = FALSE,
  labels = NULL,
  size = "md",
  help = NULL,
  disabled = FALSE
)
```

## Column

### Unemployment Rate Over Time

```{r timeline-value-country}
# Unemployment Rate Over Time
result <- viz_timeline(
  data = data,
  title = "Unemployment Rate Over Time",
  time_var = "year",
  y_var = "value",
  group_var = "country",
  agg = "none",
  chart_type = "line",
  y_label = "Unemployment Rate (%)",
  x_label = "Year",
  cross_tab_filter_vars = "country"
)

result <- dashboardr::.embed_cross_tab(result)

result
```
